doc.field: RM C M f0405reute r f BC-WEST-GERMANS-TO-MINT 03-25 0054
WEST GERMANS TO MINT COMMUNITY ANNIVERSARY COIN

The West German Cabinet approved a plan to mint a special 10-mark coin commemorating the 30th anniversary of the European Community this year. The silver-copper alloy coin will be minted in an edition of 8.35 mln, a Finance Ministry statement said. REUTER
